key.name: max-entries
key.description: Maximum number of clipboard entries to keep in history

key.name: max-entry-length
key.description: Maximum length of individual clipboard entries

key.name: min-entry-length
key.description: Ignore entries shorter than this many characters

key.name: enhanced-copy-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for enhanced copying

key.name: enhanced-paste-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut for enhanced pasting

key.name: show-menu-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to show clipboard history menu

key.name: classic-filter-all-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to switch Classic list filter to All items and open the menu.

key.name: classic-filter-pinned-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to switch Classic list filter to only pinned items and open the menu.

key.name: classic-filter-starred-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to switch Classic list filter to only starred items and open the menu.

key.name: classic-toggle-pin-top-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to toggle pinned state on the most recent history item.

key.name: classic-toggle-star-top-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to toggle starred state on the most recent history item.

key.name: show-numbers
key.description: Display numbers next to clipboard entries

key.name: entries-per-page
key.description: Number of entries to show per page in the menu

key.name: context-menu-items
key.description: Number of recent clipboard entries to show in the right-click context menu.

key.name: ignore-passwords
key.description: Don't save clipboard content from password fields

key.name: clear-on-logout
key.description: Clear clipboard history and remove ~/.config/clipflow-pro/history.json on logout

key.name: pause-on-lock
key.description: Pause clipboard monitoring when the screen is locked and resume on unlock.

key.name: clear-on-lock
key.description: Clear clipboard history when the screen is locked.

key.name: auto-clear-sensitive
key.description: Automatically remove password-like entries after 5 minutes

key.name: show-copy-notifications
key.description: Display a GNOME notification when ClipFlow Pro copies an entry

key.name: show-copied-preview
key.summary: Show entry preview in copy toast
key.description: Include the first characters of the copied entry in notifications

key.name: copy-as-plain-text
key.description: Sanitize copied text by stripping zero-width and control characters and normalizing whitespace.

key.name: copied-preview-length
key.description: Number of characters to show in the copy notification preview

key.name: capture-primary
key.description: Also capture selections from the PRIMARY buffer into history

key.name: dedupe-mode
key.description: Either ignore duplicate entries or move the latest duplicate to the top

key.name: enable-debug-logs
key.description: Write verbose ClipFlow Pro diagnostics to the GNOME Shell log to help troubleshoot clipboard activity

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position of clipboard icon in the top panel

key.name: icon-size-override
key.description: Override icon size in pixels (0 = auto)

key.name: show-preview
key.description: Show preview of clipboard entry content in menu

key.name: use-compact-ui
key.description: Toggle to use the slimmer legacy menu styling instead of the modern boxed look.

key.name: use-legacy-menu-items
key.description: Render clipboard entries using the older popup-oriented layout instead of the Wayland-safe actor rows.

key.name: rendering-mode
key.description: Choose how entries are rendered: auto (detect/fallback), classic (PopupMenu rows), or enhanced (container + pagination).

key.name: classic-max-rows
key.description: Maximum number of rows to show in classic rendering mode.

key.name: disable-css
key.description: Do not apply the ClipFlow Pro stylesheet; useful for theme compatibility troubleshooting.

key.name: warn-conflicts
key.description: Show a one-time notification if likely conflicting clipboard managers (CopyQ, GPaste) are running.

key.name: show-timestamps
key.description: Display when each clipboard entry was copied

key.name: hide-pinned
key.description: Do not show the pinned chip strip at the top of the menu.

key.name: hide-starred
key.description: Do not show the dedicated Starred section above the main list.

key.name: ignore-apps
key.description: Comma-separated list of app names or IDs to ignore when capturing

key.name: promote-on-copy
key.description: When clicking an entry to copy, move it to the top and refresh its timestamp

key.name: pause-duration-minutes
key.description: Default number of minutes to pause clipboard monitoring

key.name: io-folder
key.description: Folder path used for import and export. When empty, Desktop is used if available, otherwise Downloads, then Home.

key.name: target-prefs-tab
key.description: Internal key used to focus a specific tab when the preferences window opens.
